short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn Instant eGift Card Rewards while Shopping with the Direct Rewards Plugin. Redeem Rewards at hundreds of brands and retailers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One rewards card to rule them all! 
Earn Instant eGift Card Rewards while shopping online at thousands of brands and retailers with the Direct Rewards Plugin! The plugin displays an alert on Google search/shopping pages if an eligible brand is offering rewards for purchasing with the plugin. When the plugin link is clicked for an eligible brand, the rewards incentive is automatically calculated and when a purchase is made, points are earned instantly ready to be redeemed as eGift Cards. eGift Cards are sent to the entered email address upon redemption.You can browse the list of available eGift Card Reward options here: https://commercedirect.io/rewards.

It's as easy as 1, 2, 3!

Shop as you normally would. 

Use Google Search and Shopping as you normally would to browse for products to purchase.

Click through the Plugin. 

Be on the lookout for the Plugin when an eligible and relevant brand appears during your shopping experience. Click through the Plugin link to then shop with that brand.

Redeem Rewards! 

Immediately receive valuable points when you make a purchase through the Plugin! Points earned range from 2-20% of the purchase price in Dollar value and can be redeemed through eGift cards at hundreds of brands and retailers at any time. **Redemption is fast and easy directly through the Plugin. Your eGift Card is sent to your email and ready to use instantly.

**Please note that any returned items will not eligible receive points to be redeemed from purchases as they will be clawed back. Failure to comply may result in account suspension or removal and/or other legal action. Please reach out to info@commercedirect.io for other inquiries or questions on our policies.
